meta.disclaimer: openFDA is a beta research project and not for clinical use. While we make every effort to ensure that data is accurate, you should assume all results are unvalidated.

results.reason_for_recall: Lansal, Inc. (d.b.a. Hot Mama's Foods) is recalling approximately 14,860 pounds of hummus and dip products due to concerns about possible Listeria monocytogenes.
results.product_description: Spicy Yellow Lentil Hummus sold under the Eat Well Embrace Life brand and packaged in a transparent plastic tub with a net weight of 10 oz.
results.code_info: All products with the "Use By" dates of JUN/10/14 E and JUN/12/14 E

results.reason_for_recall:
Falafel King is recalling their Green Chile Hummus
because the green chile topping was recalled by Bueno Foods for Listeria Monocytogenes.
results.distribution_pattern: Colorado and NM. No foreign, military/govt,VA consignees.
results.product_description: Falafel King Green Chile Hummus, 10 oz, Plastic Tub, packaged in 12count and 8 count cases. Labeled in part ** Falafel King  green chile   hummus  GF  100% NATURAL**
results.initial_firm_notification: Two or more of the following: Email, Fax, Letter, Press Release, Telephone, Visit

results.reason_for_recall: Potential undeclared peanuts in cumin ingredient.

Sabra Dipping Co. LLC, White Plains, NY
